sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Rin Tin Tin, June Marlowe, Josef Swickard, Walter Miller, Buzz Barton
Director: Richard Thorpe
After a blind rancher and his partner discover a gold mine, the two men are mysteriously ambushed during a sandstorm. One vanishes, and the other is killed‚Äìleaving the latter‚Äôs faithful and remarkably intelligent dog as the only one who knows the way to the mine!
  üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro

1:33:01  CHAPTER 6:  Surrounded by the Law
1:51:19  CHAPTER 7:  The Ghost Speaks

metadata.Plot: A prospector is murdered by The Cactus Kid and his gang, who hope to find the murdered man's goldmine. The miner's dog, Rin-Tin-Tin, recognizes the killers, who thereafter seek to use the dog to locate the lost mine. With the help of a government agent and a young girl, Rinty saves the mine and brings the bad guys to justice.
metadata.Writer: William P. Burt, Bennett Cohen, Harry L. Fraser
metadata.Actors: Rin Tin Tin, Walter Miller, June Marlowe
